```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(bbplot)
library(scales)
library(forecast)
library(tsbox)
```


```{r}
data <- read_csv("data/cases.csv") 
```



```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=20}
data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=date, y=cases)) +
  geom_line() +
  bbc_style()
```
